Elven Bow

The Elven Bow is a unique ranged weapon in Remixed Pixel Dungeon that is the signature weapon of the Elf class. It has special properties that make it particularly effective in the hands of an Elf.

Stats

  • Type: Ranged weapon
  • Damage: 1-7 (source: ElvenBow.java:18)
  • Durability: 20 (source: ElvenBow.java:19)
  • Weight: 1 (source: ElvenBow.java:20)
  • Accuracy modifier: +1 (source: ElvenBow.java:21)
  • Speed modifier: +1 (source: ElvenBow.java:22)

Description

Forged by the Elves of the dungeons depths, this bow is made of moonwood and blessed with evocation magic. Its near-frictionless surface makes it significantly more accurate and faster than other bows.

Mechanics

  • The Elven Bow has a higher accuracy bonus than other ranged weapons (source: ElvenBow.java:21)
  • It's also faster than other ranged weapons, allowing more shots per turn (source: ElvenBow.java:22)
  • The bow is specifically designed for use with elven arrows (source: ElvenBow.java)
  • When used by the Elf class, it has additional advantages (source: ElvenBow.java)

Upgrading

The Elven Bow can be upgraded using Scrolls of Upgrade, which increases its damage and durability. At +1 it gains bonus accuracy, and at +2 it gains bonus speed.

Classes

  • Elf - The Elven Bow is this class's starting weapon and synergizes with their abilities

Strategy

The Elven Bow is most effective when used by the Elf class, which can take advantage of its special properties. It's an excellent ranged weapon for maintaining distance from enemies while dealing consistent damage.
